name: Promotion Class: Blackguard
description:
Role: Melee Defense

This dweller of darkness achieves victory through outlasting their opponents, in every possible way.

Stat Adjustments:
Health +1050

Traits Granted:
Axe Mastery
Dagger Mastery
Mace Mastery

Enhancements:
Kidney Shot: Now adds a Bleed when used.
In The Zone: Now increases the duration per pip spent.
Backstab: Now adds a Barrier when used.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Blackguard promotion class and prevents access to the Cutthroat and Vandal promotion classes.
